item.title: The Unbearable Lightness of Being There
item.description: Eve: May I ask your name? Chance: Chance. Eve: Chance? Chance: Chance, the gardener. Eve: Chauncey Gardiner? Mr. Chauncey Gardiner. Are you related to Basil and Perdita Gardiner? – Being There, 1979 People tell us who they are, but we ignore it. Because we want them to be what we we want them to be. –Don Draper, Mad Men President Obama used his third Oval Office address in seven years to say “Honey, I shrunk the country.
